21-018SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, May 27, 2021Page 1 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JUNE 24, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Rock, seconded by Commissioner Coffee, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Eric Rock, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 2 - Jenny Novak and Alan Tolkoff2.

21-019SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Conservation Corps of Long Beach on their Green Jobs Programs.Commissioner Novak joined the meeting.Commissioner Tolkoff joined the meeting.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke.Commissioner Dillon spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke.Page 2 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JUNE 24, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Dan Knapp, Executive Director, Conservation Corps of Long Beach.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Rock, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 11 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan Wheeler3.

21-020SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the LA Cleantech Incubator on their Green Jobs Report.Chair Wheeler spoke.Estelle Reyes, SVP of Enhancing Communities, LA Cleantech Incubator, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Daniel Ferguson, Director of Workforce Development, LA Cleantech Incubator, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Estelle Reyes, SVP of Enhancing Communities, LA Cleantech Incubator, Page 3 of 6HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JUNE 24, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESspoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Estelle Reyes, SVP of Enhancing Communities, LA Cleantech Incubator, spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Tolkoff, seconded by Commissioner Skye, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 11 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan Wheeler4.
